articles.title: Nicki Minaj apologises to fans over postponed Manchester show - BBC.com
articles.description: The rapper reschedules her Manchester show following her arrest in the Netherlands.
articles.content:
Nicki Minaj has apologised to fans after postponing a concert in Manchester following her arrest in the Netherlands. 
The rapper, 41, was due to play the city's Co-op Live arena on Saturday, but had… [+1700 chars]
